item.title: Wine Glass
Helmet
item.description: See the full source code here. // Main shape - We make a smooth blend between a sphere and a cone let sphere = Sphere(0.24); let cone = Cone(0.3, 0.25, 0.0); let helmet = smin(sphere, cone, 0.5); // Assign the material helmet.material.rgb = F3("9F6F4A"); helmet.material.metallic = 0.7; helmet.material.roughness = 0.3; // Make it hollow by creating a copy, subtract it and move it down a bit // to open the bottom let cut_out = helmet.
